translation.en: ♪ And one of us is gonna be runnin'
♪ Off alone into the great unknown
♪ You're not me, you're a model of freedom
Here, let me top you off there, Jimmy.
I've got that sausage coming right up for you, Dale.
Fran, I am digging that new hair.
You want me to take it?
Do you mind if we order?
Yeah. What can I get for you guys?
EMMA: And what can I do you for?
Let's just see here. You got any specials?
And I saved you a slice.
Two more days, just two more days.
It's going to be so hard not to look back on these
translation.ko: 이 시간을 결코 못 잊을 거예요

translation.en: as the best four years of our lives.
But there is a whole world out there just waiting for us... (DOOR OPENING)
Dad, I thought you were gonna wait for me outside.

translation.ko: 밖에서 기다릴 줄 알았어 - 세상은 - 시작했길래

translation.en: A whole world just waiting for us to make our mark.
translation.ko: - 세상은 - 시작했길래 찬란한 성공을 선보이기 위한 세상이죠

translation.en: "You must be the change you want to see in the world."
You know, I haven't been here since I didn't graduate.
And long may you reign. Mama!
Just, uh, there are children here.
Well, it's nice to see you too, Meg.
Mom, what is she doing here?
It's sweet. She wanted to be here.
Oh, come on. You made her come.
ROBERT: Why don't we take a picture?
Yes, come on, come on. Mom.
Pam, I don't want you worrying a bit about Grace on this trip.
I'm going to take good care of her.
You guys, this is great. Thank you for this.
translation.ko: 환송회도 해주시고 두 분 정말 감사해요

translation.en: No, no, I love it. Thank you, Robert.
That will take you to Paris and straight to NYU in the fall.
translation.ko: 감사합니다 파리 갈 때랑 가을에 대학 갈 때 쓰렴

translation.en: The next thing is for both my girls.
translation.ko: 우리 두 딸에게 줄 선물이 있어

translation.en: Got to get used to saying that.
Well, you and Emma are both heading off to Paris tomorrow.
They are not gonna know what hit 'em.
PAM: And Meg is free for the summer.
And we thought, you know, uh,
why not kick this new sister thing into high gear?
What are you talking about? Do you know what they're talking about?

translation.ko: 무슨 소리죠? 넌 알아듣겠어? 나도 몰라

translation.en: Meg is going to Paris, too. (CHUCKLES)
ROBERT: You would've said no. No?
No to the sisterhood of the traveling to France?
translation.ko: 사랑 넘치는 자매끼리 프랑스 여행을 하는데

translation.en: Are you crazy? Who could pass that up?
Honey, you don't have to do that.
In fact, all through high school, all I could think,
on the few occasions Texas Barbie managed to make it to class, was,
"When I finally do go to Europe,
"I want it to be with Emma Perkins."
I don't even know why she's going.
She'd be just as happy at Six Flags on beer night.
translation.ko: 밤에 맥주 파는 놀이공원이 취향일 텐데

translation.en: And I'm not her sister, no matter what
you and Pam do with your lives.
(SIGHS) Why are you doing this to me?
Because I don't know how to make this any better.
translation.ko: 아빠가 뭘 더 어떻게 할지 모르겠구나

translation.en: You have one year of college left.
You've stayed in every weekend since the funeral.
translation.ko: 엄마 장례 치르고 주말에 집에만 있잖니

translation.en: You should be going out there, with friends.
Of all the places she traveled,
she always said Paris was her favorite.
I guess, on the bright side, is that we are being upgraded.
Not that it's gonna make much of a difference anyway.
Everything is so much better over there already.
translation.ko: 파리는 모든 게 훨씬 나을 텐데

translation.en: Yeah, they got the clothes and the shoes.
Just stay here. You'll be fine.
translation.ko: - 그냥 여기 있어 - 자긴 괜찮을 거야

translation.en: we been real serious for a while,
and I've been thinking about asking you this.
translation.ko: 우리 잘 만나왔잖아 계속 말하려고 했어

translation.en: And where's the ring? The, uh...
Do you think you'd be asking me to marry you tonight
if I wasn't headed off to the City of Love tomorrow?
I think you mean the City of Lights.
Something big is finally about to happen for me.
And you choose the night before I leave to ask?
Emma, I got everything I want right here in this truck.
translation.ko: 난 바라는 게 전부 여기 있어

translation.en: I've never once been outside of Texas.
Have yourself a real nice trip.
And I'll send you a postcard.
Yeah, you do that. Yeah, I said I will.
I might not be here to get it.
translation.ko: - 그러셔 - 꼭 보낼게 못 받을지도 몰라

translation.en: Well, where are you gonna be, huh?
PAM: I love Emma. I love her zest.
But you just don't want me to go to Paris alone with her.
translation.ko: 근데 엠마랑 파리 가는 게 싫은가 보네

translation.en: Look, I know you two have gotten close at work, but...
Mom, Emma is my friend. I appreciate that, Grace,
and I appreciate that Meg is not your first choice,
translation.ko: 엄마도 알지 멕이랑 가기 싫은 것도

translation.en: but knowing that you'll be with a responsible adult...
translation.ko: 멕이랑 가기 싫은 것도 그래도 여행은 어른이랑 가야 해

translation.en: Meg is whatever comes after adult.
Mom, I have been saving for this.
This is what's gotten me through the last four years
of pep rallies and cheer squads.
Imagining myself walking along the Seine
translation.ko: 센 강을 따라 걷는 내 모습이랑

translation.en: and standing on top of the Eiffel Tower.
It's not going to turn you into a whole different person.
translation.ko: 널 완전히 다른 사람으로 바꿔주지 않아

translation.en: Thank goodness. I'm kind of partial to the one I've got.
translation.ko: 엄만 지금 이대로의 우리 딸이 정말 좋아

translation.en: Mom, you've found a whole new life with Robert.
Just let me go find mine.
Nobody wants you to find your life more than I do.
translation.ko: 우리 딸이 꿈을 이루기를 엄마는 진심으로 바란단다

translation.en: I have to get to the hospital.
Take the upgrade, don't take the upgrade.
MEG: In five days. We're never gonna get to all this stuff.
GRACE: I know it's a lot, Meg,
but there's a lot to see. It's Paris.
You can't do the Louvre in 20 minutes.
EMMA: It's their museum. I think they know how long it takes.
How are they all moving so fast?
they're not wearing four-inch hoochie heels, for starters.
Let me tell you something about shoes, Meg.
Oh, no more wine. Sorry. Finished, finished. No more. What is that?
No, I can't eat that. WAITER: Pardon.
Well... TOUR GUIDE: Eat quickly, please.
TOUR GUIDE: Quickly, please. Okay. Thank you. On your right.
Well, there has to be some kind of mistake.
Oh, yeah, why don't you just toddle downstairs
and sort it all out, en francais?
Can we just please make the best of it?
I mean, we'll hardly ever be here.
translation.ko: 좋게 생각하면 어디 덧나? 방에선 잠만 잘 텐데

translation.en: Oh, great. Now find an outlet,
and I don't want to miss when Owen calls to apologize.
translation.ko: 휴대전화가 꺼지려고 해 오언이 잘못했다고 전화 오면 받아야 해

translation.en: ...you guys to act like we're having a really good time, okay?
We are having a good time.
No one is having a good time.
I get it, it's your thing, but come on, we're in Paris.
GRACE: Do you have any change?
Wow. You can see everything from up here.
I saw you at Sacre-Coeur yesterday, didn't I?
GRACE: Meg, the bus is leaving!
We don't have time! Excuse me!

translation.ko: - 뭐 하는 거야 - 버스 세워요 - 기다려요 - 제발

translation.en: Okay, Meg, it's a disaster! Are you happy?
Hey, it's okay. No, it's not.
What is the matter with you?
I single-handedly chose the worst tour in all of Paris.
translation.ko: 이 따위 여행을 고른 내 탓이지

translation.en: Meg, I'm not quite up to reviewing my process right now.
So let's just say that I'm sorry, okay?
Emma, I'm sorry that you wasted your savings.

translation.ko: 엠마 여행을 망쳐서 미안해 네 덕분에 왔는 걸

translation.en: I'm even sorry that you got dragged into this
and that I'll have to hear about it every
Thanksgiving and Christmas for the next however many years.
I'm sorry that I ever thought I was the kind of person that could come to Paris.
translation.ko: 내가 파리를 누릴 만하다고 생각했다는 거야

translation.en: I'm sorry. Can we just leave it at that?
What in the heck was that all...
I am sorry, but there is nothing.
And how do you propose I travel to Monte Carlo in the morning?
Yeah, yeah, Grace, you just got to pull it together.
and don't be whatever it is that you are.
Mademoiselle Scott, Mademoiselle Scott... No, Miss Scott,
I have checked and there is nothing. No sign of package.
This is not English we are speaking?
Mother's forcing me to go to some charity thing to repair my rep.
translation.ko: 엄마가 자선행사 가서 악평 좀 줄이래서

translation.en: I don't know. Polar bears, hungry people.
translation.ko: 엄마가 자선행사 가서 악평 좀 줄이래서 북극곰이나 가난뱅이 돕는 행사겠지

translation.en: If I leave now, I can catch a flight and be on the beach by the morning.
No, I won't even check out.
Mummy will think I'm off doing her errand.
translation.ko: 말 잘 듣고 있다고 속이는 거지

translation.en: By the time she works out that I'm not there or here...
translation.ko: 엄마가 알아챘을 때는 난 여기 없을 거야

translation.en: Let me call you when I get to the airport.
GRACE: Emma. It may take a while.

translation.ko: - 엠마 - 시간 좀 걸리겠어 비가 오나 봐

translation.en: GRACE: Can you hand me a towel?
Who does she think she is?
EMMA: I'm telling you, trust us. GRACE: You guys, easy.
Look at this. Look, with her hair pulled back.
translation.ko: - 정신 차려 - 잘 봐 머리를 뒤로 묶으면

translation.en: You didn't even see her. I heard her.
Yeah, that's the same thing. That's crazy.
Look this way. You guys are like twins.
Scowl. (GROWLS) Do it. If only you were British.
translation.ko: - 그만해 - 인상 써 봐 영국 억양만 쓰면 돼

translation.en: Mummy wants me to help people, poor people.
How are you doing that? That's really creepy.
It kind of sounds like a mean Mary Poppins. I like it, do more.
translation.ko: 못된 마녀 같아 난 좋으니까 더 해봐

translation.en: Okay. I want to go to Spain.
I want to see my friends. I want a golden goose.
translation.ko: 친구도 보고 싶고 황금 거위도 갖고 싶어

translation.en: Excuse me, Miss Scott. Good news.
The courier successfully located your package.
(IN NORMAL VOICE) Oh, no, I'm not...
No. No, there has been a mistake.
Your package will be here in the morning.
we have found, as you requested,
(IN ENGLISH ACCENT) I shall take it in my room.
Can you imagine having a room like this and not even staying in it?
Yeah. So, we're not staying here.
Great, now we have to make the bed.
EMMA: Relax. GRACE: We're just resting.
Meg, come on, it's been a really long day.
I'm not a hundred percent sure, but I think my car is here.
translation.ko: 확실히 알아듣지는 못했는데 차가 와 있대

translation.en: Miss Scott, your package. Your package has arrived this morning.
Let's help you to your car.
Oh, yes, please! Thank you, again.
No, thank you. But we'll walk.
But you cannot walk to the airport.
MEG: They really do think you're her.
What? I want to know where we're going.
We're going back to our crap tour.
We are going to Monte Carlo.
Grace, what does "prive" mean? Is that an airline?
See, Grace wants to go. Forget it.
The trip is paid for, whether Cordelia takes it or not.
translation.ko: 코델리아가 가건 말건 돈은 이미 다 냈어

translation.en: And she is a million miles away.
And then you'll get to say, "I told you so."
translation.ko: 그럼 그때 내 말이 맞았다고 말해

translation.en: Like you're going to pass that up.
I am never flying commercial again.
Hello. Let's read all about you.
I don't look anything like that.
No, no, she has a better nose.
"...was caught by paparazzi in Reykjavik when she..."
Cordelia, you are a bad, bad girl.
I still made it before the little monster arrived.
On behalf of the Marchand Family Foundation
it's my pleasure to welcome you to Monte Carlo.
I am Bernard Marchand and my son, Theo.
(IN ENGLISH ACCENT) Uh, yes, this is Emma Perkins and Meg Kelly.
Friends from the States that I picked up somehow.
Meg speaks French. Yeah, I just got that.
translation.ko: 방해가 안 되길 바라요 - 프랑스어 하네? - 나도 방금 알았어

translation.en: and Theo will be back to pick you up this evening.
translation.ko: 테오가 저녁에 데리러 올 겁니다 우선 방으로 들어요

translation.en: Yes, I will escort you to the ball.
This keeps getting better and better.
The Prince's ball. The one being thrown in her honor.
translation.ko: 왕자님이 그쪽을 위해 친히 주최하는 무도회요

translation.en: We've got to get out of here.
This is all paid for. You never leave when it's paid for.
translation.ko: 이미 계산도 끝났는데 그냥 버릴 순 없지

translation.en: What are they teaching you in college?
Emma, Meg is right. This is too crazy.
translation.ko: 멕 말이 맞아 이건 너무 심해

translation.en: You don't take somebody's private jet to Monte Carlo...
...find out they're throwing you a ball in your honor
translation.ko: 널 위한 무도회라는데 이제 와서 못 간다고 할래?

translation.en: and then go, "Oh, no, I couldn't possibly!"
You go. Is this a real conversation?
Emma, we are way out of our league.
They're going to see right through me.
Just keep up the accent and look down your nose.
I'm sure Meg can help you out with that.
This was never part of the plan. I'm out.
You know what the problem is with you two?
It's that you are exactly alike.
We are nothing alike. We are nothing alike.
translation.ko: 이럴 땐 둘이 닮았다는 거야 - 안 닮았어 - 안 닮았어

translation.en: Okay, fine, you kids want a plan?
real Cordelia gets to play hooky for a few days,
Frere Jacques gets his charity girl,

translation.ko: 베르나르는 자선 행사를 하지 그리고 우린

translation.en: all get the vacation that I deserve.
All right, I'll tell you one thing right now, heels are a no.
in an Oscar de la Renta.
Oh, I just did my make-up.
Save the tears for the police.
Can you just for one minute...
Y'all, I think mine is on backwards.
Or maybe the other me has a little more going on upstairs.
Just feels like something... Is missing?
What are you hearing from the girls?
Paris, man, that is far out.
We don't call it the City of Love for nothing.
Is that Emma? Is Emma there?
Yeah, well, we'll see about that.
EMMA: Would you relax? She is with French fry.
translation.ko: 그 프랑스 남자랑 있으니 걱정 붙들어 매

translation.en: I thought you were keeping an eye on her.
translation.ko: 그 프랑스 남자랑 있으니 걱정 붙들어 매 잘 지켜봤어야지

translation.en: (WHISPERING) Why do people keep staring? Is something slipping?
Oh. My father says we can build 20 schools
translation.ko: 그 돈으로 학교 20개를 세울 수 있대요

translation.en: with the money we will raise.
That's a lot of futures you're changing.
It almost makes dressing up worth it.
Well, people are maybe looking at your necklace,
but me, I have been admiring the boots.
translation.ko: 사람들은 목걸이를 보겠지만 나한테는 부츠가 인상적이네요

translation.en: Oh, uh, how do you do?
Hey, how you doing? MEG: Yeah, hi.
Hey, Cordelia, you were supposed to wait by the door.
I was, but then he had me working the room.
translation.ko: 코델리아 문 옆에서 기다렸어야지 저 남자가 사람들한테 인사시키잖아

translation.en: DOMENICO: Would you care to dance?
No, thank you, Dom. He's not talking to you.
My father is very grateful to your aunt.
She persuaded your mother to donate to our charity.
MEG: Alicia Winthrop Scott was married to your late Uncle William.
translation.ko: 우리 숙모? 알리시아 스콧은 돌아가신 네 삼촌 부인이야

translation.en: Well, hello, it's called HELLO! magazine for a reason.
He died two years ago on safari.
Okay, you were born in Shropshire, parents divorced.
Schooled at Le Rosey, but you were expelled
because you set your roommate's hair on fire
I'm so glad to see that you're here.
Well, where else would I be than here,
in Monte Carlo, where I'm supposed to be?
I just wanted to come and verify your presence for myself.
Some peace of mind for your poor mother.
Well, lovely to see you. Now if you'll excuse me.
translation.ko: 네 엄마도 안심시킬 겸 정말 반가웠어요 이만 갈게요

translation.en: Yes. Yes, I can't quite put my finger on it.
translation.ko: 정확하게 꼭 집어서 말은 못 하겠다만

translation.en: You can report back to Mother that I'm doing as told.
Excuse me. Well, you two seem very close.
How long are you here in Monte Carlo?
Emma. We got to go. No, I'm good.

translation.ko: 숙모님이 여기 있어 브렌다 숙모? 어디?

translation.en: Aunt Alicia, here to see her favorite niece, Cordelia.
translation.ko: 알리시아 숙모 사랑스러운 조카 코델리아를 보러 왔어

translation.en: And we have to stay here till Friday.
No, I'm telling you, she thinks you're Cordelia!
You were just crazy enough! Excuse me,
I'm going to dance with her. Sorry.
Okay, you have a taxi station just over here. Straight on.
You have to rotate every three minutes for optimal coverage.
I picked out a dress for you.
Why are you picking a fight with me?

translation.ko: 내가 뭘? 항상 그래 비꼬기나 하고

translation.en: I know what you think of me.
You have no idea how little I think about you.
You see, Grace, she's just not happy unless everybody around her is miserable.
translation.ko: 남들이 안 불행한 게 억울한 거지
남들이 안 불행한 게 억울한 거지 - 그만해 - 진심이야

translation.en: I forgot about you the minute you left high school.
translation.ko: 너 학교 그만둘 때부터 잊고 살았어
너 학교 그만둘 때부터 잊고 살았어 - 다들 그랬을걸? - 그러셨겠지

translation.en: And who quits high school for a catalog shoot in Dallas?

translation.ko: 카탈로그 찍는다고 누가 학교를 그만둬? 표지 모델이었어

translation.en: Of a Clip 'n' Save. You are so delusional.
Okay, you know what this is? We had a big night last...
You know what your problem is? It's that you are just jealous.
translation.ko: 어젯밤 흥분이 안 가라앉았구나 이러는 게 다 날 질투해서 그래

translation.en: Your best friend is an 18-year-old girl.
translation.ko: 질투? 식당 종업원인 데다 열여덟 살이랑 제일 친해
열여덟 살이랑 제일 친해 - 뭔 소리야? - 애인도 그래

translation.en: Okay, who died and made you such a...

translation.ko: 죽음 한 번 겪었다고 그따위로 엠마!

translation.en: Ma petite-amie. Emma. You answered her phone.
Come on, help me out. She's my fiancee. Here, take a look.
Yeah, you know her. Where did she go?
You're not following me, are you?
It left us behind a long time ago.
Chip-chop, spit-spot, come on, let's go!
Off we go! Quickly, come on!
(EXHALES) "Emma, please allow me the honor..." Da-da-da-da-da-da-da...
All right, this is what you've been waiting for.
Bring it on. I want to see this.
All right, I'll have a go. All right.
There we go. That's it. You actually know how to do it. That's good.
Bonjour, Lucille, this is Mademoiselle Scott.
Lucille will take care of you, she'll show you to your room.
translation.ko: 안녕하세요, 루실 스콧 양이에요 루실이 방으로 데려다줄 거예요

translation.en: Change? I'll see you on the field.
I'd love to stay and chat,

translation.ko: 얘기 더 하고 싶은데 옷 갈아입어야 해서 가볼게요

translation.en: Polo, how hard can it be?
Hey! I think we are going the other way.
Oh, right. See, at home they usually just bring the ball to me.
translation.ko: 방향 잘못 잡았네요 집에선 저한테 공을 갖다 줬거든요

translation.en: Usually with more finesse than spirit.
So, you just go wherever you like?
I'll let you know when I'm done.
And your parents are okay with this?
I think they were just happy to see me walk out of there, you know?
What, did they say you'd never walk again or something?
I was never much good at being told what I couldn't do.
But I was in hospital for a year just flat on my back.
My teammates would come and visit in the beginning,
I was just a reminder of what could happen to them.
get hit in the wrong place, never play rugby again.
translation.ko: 잘못 부딪혀서 다신 럭비를 못하게 됐죠

translation.en: trekking around for a while just seemed like the best way back.
I can't find my way back.
I went to the hospital to see her every day she was there.
Everyone was so nice, and understanding, and comforting, and...
Look, I won't even listen. I won't listen.
Come on, hit the ball. Cordelia!
Is it all right if I take her? I'd love to brush her down.
You've never been one to clear up after yourself.
A new leaf, a new me.
It appears you've made a friend.
I know. Isn't she a beauty?
Remember that darling pony you had as a girl?
My childhood, please! You know I never look back.
translation.ko: 어렸을 때라니요 그런 건 기억 안 해요

translation.en: Oh, you remember the black one with the little white star on his forehead.
translation.ko: 이마에 흰 별이 있던 검은 녀석이었잖니

translation.en: Yes. Uh... The one with the star.
I really should get her back to the stables, so...
And you, if I'm not mistaken, were taught to ride Western.
I'm just a little out of practice, that's all.
Well, this is a new low even for Cordelia.
To hire a look-alike to stand in her stead
at a charity event organized just for her
I don't know if it's the champagne or the sunlight that's got to you.
Oh, I will call security immediately.
that I will do whatever is expected of Cordelia tomorrow.
I'm not about to stand in the way of helping those kids.
No one must ever know. Is that clear? Crystal.
Here you are. What a wonderful match.
The ambassador is ready for us.
If you muck this up, you will have me to answer to.
Both of you. Pass it on.
Bling, bling, bling, bling, bling, bling, bling...
It's one of the two things my father taught me.
translation.ko: 아빠가 가르쳐 준 두 가지 중 하나예요

translation.en: It's actually more handy than you might think.
No, here. Put your fingers like this
and now curl your tongue like that.
You make me think it is.
Mostly I always feel the same.
Same people, same conversations, same parties.
translation.ko: 같은 사람, 같은 대화 파티도 똑같아요

translation.en: I mean, you're raising money, building schools.
I wish I were part of something that important.
But that's my father. That's not me.
I've never been to those schools.
translation.ko: 난 하는 게 없어요 그런 학교에 가본 적도 없어요

translation.en: I've never been to Africa, to Romania.
I'm only faking my way through.
I know what that feels like.
But there is nothing fake about you.
I want to show you something.
And then we're gonna go meet his friends and then we're gonna go dancing!
translation.ko: 그 사람 친구들 만나서 춤추러 갈 거야

translation.en: Meg, what has gotten into you?
There's the Meg that I know.
THEO: I'm trying to impress you.
GRACE: Mmm. So far, so good.
When I was little, I had a snow globe of the Eiffel Tower,
and when you wound it up it played
And when I shook it, the snow inside sparkled.
Just like this. ♪ I see la vie en rose
♪ When you press me to your heart
Look at this one. ♪ Angels sing from above
I had a lovely time tonight.
Theo, I need to tell you something.
I'll see you at the auction, all right?
You know how on Hastings Avenue,
translation.ko: 우리 옆 동네에 있는 집들 말이야

translation.en: how all the houses are set way back?
With the front walks and big lawns and driveways.
translation.ko: 현관이랑 잔디밭은 물론이고 마당에 차도도 있잖아

translation.en: I always wondered about the kind of people that lived there.
You know, the kind of people with
the dimmer switches on their lights.
I thought Owen and I were gonna live in a house like that one day.
translation.ko: 언젠가 오언이랑도 그런 데서 살 줄 알았어

translation.en: I don't need a fancy house.
Grace, what if I blew it?
Hey, don't you worry about it.
I know. I know you will.
I finally meet a guy who likes me for me,
translation.ko: 내 모습 그대로를 좋아하는 남자를 만났는데

translation.en: But I feel like I am when I'm with him.
translation.ko: 그런데 같이 있으면 진짜 나 같아

translation.en: If Theo finds out, he's gonna hate me.
Once he knows the real you,
he's just gonna know how lucky he is.
I knew it from the minute I laid eyes on you.
Back up to the old Grimaldi Suite.
It's not as posh as this.
You just pitch your tent right on the beach.
The train leaves at noon if you change your mind.
Will you relax? It's okay, she is right here.
Yeah, I heard you the first hundred times.
On my neck. I'm not going to relax
until that thing is back in its case.
translation.ko: 상자에 넣기 전에는 긴장 못 풀어

translation.en: What is going on with you two?
Can you please just give her the necklace?

translation.ko: 무슨 목걸이? "코델리아 스콧 목걸이로 아이들 돕다"

translation.en: It's in his backpack. I put it in his backpack to be safe!
translation.ko: 안전하게 두려고 그 사람 가방에 넣었어

translation.en: Okay, so Riley has it. Where is he staying?
No, Emma, he didn't steal anything.
He's getting on a train to Italy.
Are you kidding me? At noon.
How far is the train station from here?
Oh, hey, what's she doing here?
Forgot how I hate the French.
Do not even think about it.
Well, can you wait for me?
I just have this tiresome auction I have to deal with.
I was meant to have a suite.
Stavros is supposed to be here, isn't he? I don't see his boat.
translation.ko: 스타브로스는 안 왔나 보네 보트가 안 보여

translation.en: If you have finished, you may go.
If you have finished, you may go.
Emma, go. No, I can't move.
EMMA: I can't breathe, I can't breathe, I can't breathe.
So unfair. I never get to see my friends.
I never do what I want.
When is it going to be my turn?
translation.ko: 언제쯤 내 마음대로 할 수 있을까?

translation.en: Let's just get on a train and go.
I pretended to be that girl and now I lost her necklace.
What? I have to fix this.
Could you be a little positive?
One night out and look at you.
I was wondering if you could tell me where the Grimaldi Suite is, please.
I've been robbed. Call the police.
No, I said police! Call the police!
No, I said police! Call the...
Oh, forget it! I'll do it myself!

translation.ko: - 절대 아니에요 - 말도 안 돼요 - 무슨 소리예요 - 그렇죠?

translation.en: Police? I'm calling to report a robbery at the Hotel de Paris.
Someone has been robbed? No, nobody.
Theo! Nobody has been robbed. We're all right.
Well, because this feels like a game.
(IN NORMAL VOICE) It's not a game. Not to me.
But I do need to tell you something.
It starts in five minutes. Ladies, five minutes.
The necklace! Do not touch that bell!
Hi. I need to find this girl.
Thought it was a pretty good excuse for a second shot.
Wait for me in the lobby. You got it.
Don't leave. I'm not going anywhere.
translation.ko: - 가버리면 안 돼요 - 아무 데도 안 가요

translation.en: Pardon me. Hold on one second there, boss.
You're telling me that Emma is staying here?
I told you this. Mademoiselle Scott's friend.
GRACE: Listen... Save your sorries for the police.
But it's right here. I have it.
It's just a case of mistaken identity.
It's impersonation and it's a crime,
one I'm putting a stop to this instant.
Let me assure you that there will be no auction now.
Hey! People are counting on her!
I promise you it is a false alarm.
She said everything was fine. Quoi?
Excusez-moi. We had a call. There was a robbery?

translation.ko: - 오해가 있었나 봐요 - 거보세요 목걸이를 못 찾았거든요

translation.en: Yes, she couldn't find her necklace.
What? Where is she? I'm right here.
I can't quite manage the clasp.
But tell me, we heard a scream.
right now, she was so, so happy.
Yes, I'm very sorry to have wasted your time.
allow me to escort you, mademoiselle, you know, as a precaution.
Would you? I'm afraid I'm already late.
We'll let you go as soon as the auction is over.
you'll think of the girl you showed the fireworks to.
Owen! What are you doing here?
Trust me, you don't want to go up there.
Why is she talking like that?
(GROANS) She's not. Please, both of you, just stay here.
translation.ko: 쟤는 괜찮으니까 둘 다 여기서 기다려요

translation.en: It's fine, he's waiting with Riley.
I'm really glad you came, Meg.
I wouldn't miss this for the world.
You will never get away with this.
Honey, we've been getting away with this for days.
What are you... What are you doing here?
translation.ko: - 여기서 뭐 해? - 여기서 뭐 해?

translation.en: What am I doing here? I've been running all over Paris looking for you.
You went all the way to Paris for me?
I don't want to lose you, Emma.
Maybe I was trying to fence you in a bit.
that once you saw everything there was to see here,
translation.ko: 불안했나 봐 파리의 모든 걸 다 보고 나면

translation.en: And look, I'm sorry for that,
because I don't ever want to keep you from something better.
But I already have the best.
So, Paris. It's pretty awesome, right?
What was what, honey? You heard it.
No, I didn't. Is someone in there?
What? Is someone in here? No.
translation.ko: - 못 들었어 - 안에 누구 있어? 말도 안 돼 있긴 누가 있어?

translation.en: BERNARD: We have a bid for 2.5.
Mesdames et messieurs, who will take us to 3,000,000?
Can I have... Please, I'm sorry.
There's something I need to say.
...that you must be the change you wish
It's true. I'm not Cordelia Scott.
I'm just a regular girl from Texas.
but I had the chance to be,
even if it was only for a minute, and I took it.
I know what I did was wrong
and I don't expect you to forgive me.
But it wasn't all a lie.
We're from Texas, we go big.

translation.ko: 텍사스 출신은 통이 커요 돈도 한 푼 없으면서

translation.en: Look at them, none of them do.
Look, you all came here to help those kids.
Please don't let my mistake get in the way of that.
I may not deserve your help,
I would like to bid 6,000,000 euros
I'm doing precisely as she has asked.
Sold for 6,000,000 euros to one Miss Scott.
Why are you just standing there? Arrest them!
For what? They seem very nice.
They stole my necklace. But the necklace is here, no?
Well, they kidnapped me and they tied me up.
And yet, you too are here.
I see no problem, everybody is very happy.
Excuse me, but I am not happy.
But this I can do nothing about.
GRACE: I don't know, Meg. Have you really thought about this?
But what did you tell your dad?
Well, I told him I'd call and check in every day,
that I won't tell him everything I'm doing,
that I'll be back in August,
My driver will take you to the airport.
Please tell Theo I said goodbye.
Au revoir! See you later. Au revoir.
Yeah, we had an amazing time.
Hey, Grace, I need somebody to run to the post office.
ARCHITECT: That was it. Yes, all right.
Now I am going to show you the foundation of the new stadium,
which is possibly to be ready by the end of the month.
translation.ko: - 이번 달 말까지는 - 네 공사가 전부 끝날 예정이에요

translation.en: We will have new lighting for each classroom,
and the computers will be here by September.
ARCHITECT: So, what do you think?
This follows the same model as you saw it in Rajasthan.
And on the other side we have the garden.
I don't think that we've properly met.
